title: Apple and Google asked to take down X and Grok apps over ‘sickening’ image generation: here's what you should know
snippet: A group of US Senators has called for the removal of the X and Grok apps from Apple and Google's stores, citing concerns over nonconsensual sexualized images of women and children generated by the chatbot, which they describe as a serious violation of app store policies.

title: Apple could bring these nine new emojis to your iPhone with iOS 27: here’s what we know
snippet: Apple may introduce new emojis in its iOS 27 update which could include a squinting smiley face, butterfly, and pickle. Proposed by the Unicode Consortium, these emojis could debut around March or April next year, alongside iOS 27.4.&nbsp;
